import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { Settings as SettingsIcon, Youtube, Instagram, MessageCircle, Database, Shield, Bell } from 'lucide-react'; import YouTubeConfig from './YouTubeConfig'; import DataCollectionStatus from './DataCollectionStatus'; type SettingsTab = 'youtube' | 'status' | 'notifications' | 'privacy'; const Settings: React.FC = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('youtube'); const tabs = [ { id: 'youtube', label: 'YouTube', icon: }, { id: 'status', label: 'Data Status', icon: }, { id: 'notifications', label: 'Notifications', icon: }, { id: 'privacy', label: 'Privacy', icon: }, ]; const renderTabContent = () => { switch (activeTab) { case 'youtube': return (

YouTube Configuration

Configure your YouTube API credentials to access real channel statistics and enable daily data collection.

{ // Handle config update if needed console.log('YouTube config updated:', config); }} /> ); case 'instagram': return (

Instagram Configuration

Connect your Instagram account via OAuth to access real-time statistics and post analytics.

{ console.log('Instagram config updated:', config); }} /> ); case 'threads': return (

Threads Configuration

Configure your Threads username to access simulated statistics and enable daily data collection.

{ console.log('Threads config updated:', config); }} /> ); case 'status': return (

Data Collection Status

Monitor data collection status for all connected platforms and manage historical data.

{/* Platform Status Overview */}

YouTube

Status: Connected
Data Collection: Active
Last Update: Today

Instagram

Status: Not Connected
Data Collection: Inactive
Last Update: Never

Threads

Status: Not Connected
Data Collection: Inactive
Last Update: Never
); case 'notifications': return (

Notification Settings

Configure notification preferences for data collection alerts and platform updates.

Notification Settings

Notification preferences will be available in future updates.

Coming Soon: Email notifications, browser alerts, and data collection reminders.

); case 'privacy': return (

Privacy & Data

Manage your data privacy settings and control how your information is stored and used.

Privacy Settings

Privacy and data management settings will be available in future updates.

Coming Soon: Data export, account deletion, and privacy controls.

); default: return null; } }; return (
{/* Header */}

Settings

Configure your platform connections and preferences

{/* Tab Navigation */}
{tabs.map((tab) => ( ))}
{/* Tab Content */}
{renderTabContent()}
); }; export default Settings;
